sentences.sContent: Local people have renewed their efforts to save the school.
sentences.sCn: 当地居民再一次作出努力，挽救这所学校。

sentences.sContent: Police renewed their appeal for witnesses.
sentences.sCn: 警察再次呼吁目击者出来作证。

words.tran: 可再生的；可更新的；可继续的
更新，恢复；复兴；补充；革新；续借；重申

trans.tranCn: 使更新；续借；续费；复兴；重申
trans.tranOther: to begin doing something again after a period of not doing it
